The bug in question occurs when I press the “away” button on the keypad, which is the newest version keypad (2017-present). The keypad begins a 1:59 countdown to away mode. 30 seconds later I open the entry sensor equipped front door and the countdown timer on the keypad display resets back up to 1:59. However, the app widget shows the original countdown time. Even though the keypad now shows 1:59 on the countdown timer, my cellphone app widget shows 90 seconds remaining. They need to sync!

It flashes by really quickly so I had to try several times to see what device it was. This error does not show up in the app anywhere. It also does not even list all your sensors. It would be so very helpful if the app told you that one of your sensor was malfunctioning and which one. Or give you a list of all your sensors and which one is open. But all it really gives you is "Turn on/off your alarm" and "View camera". I had to go to their website and login there to see the error and which sensor was causing the error. The app is sadly incredibly simplistic for such a sophisticated system. Very very disappointing.
